message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it's a perfect match for you. For this exceptional item, I am offering it at an introductory price of $120. This is a great opportunity to experience the quality and benefits we guarantee. Let me know if you're interested!

Thanks for the offer Alice, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.  Let me know if that's a price we can work with.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $100. This is a fair compromise considering the value and quality of the product. I hope this meets within your budget. Looking forward to your response!
